    • Method Detail

      • getTemperatureMax

        public float getTemperatureMax(float lat,
                               float lon,
                               int year)
        Get the max temperature at a location, given a year. If the year is the current year in the World, the temperature is the actual model temperature at that location. Otherwise it is an interpolated estimate that will NOT include the noise due to randomization in the year-stepping model.
        Specified by:
        getTemperatureMax in class AbstractClimateData
        Parameters:
        lat - [-90.0 to 90.0], South latitudes are less than 0.
        lon - [-180.0 to 180.0], West longitudes are less than 0.
        year - between current year and AbstractScenario.END_YEAR
        Returns:
        the max temperature at the coordinates, either estimated or exact, depending on the year

      • getTemperatureMin

        public float getTemperatureMin(float lat,
                               float lon,
                               int year)
        Get the min temperature at a location, given a year. If the year is the current year in the World, the temperature is the actual model temperature at that location. Otherwise it is an interpolated estimate that will NOT include the noise due to randomization in the year-stepping model.
        Specified by:
        getTemperatureMin in class AbstractClimateData
        Parameters:
        lat - [-90.0 to 90.0], South latitudes are less than 0.
        lon - [-180.0 to 180.0], West longitudes are less than 0.
        year - between current year and AbstractScenario.END_YEAR
        Returns:
        the min temperature at the coordinates, either estimated or exact, depending on the year

      • getTemperatureDay

        public float getTemperatureDay(float lat,
                               float lon,
                               int year)
        Get the average daytime temperature at a location, given a year. If the year is the current year in the World, the temperature is the actual model temperature at that location. Otherwise it is an interpolated estimate that will NOT include the noise due to randomization in the year-stepping model.
        Specified by:
        getTemperatureDay in class AbstractClimateData
        Parameters:
        lat - [-90.0 to 90.0], South latitudes are less than 0.
        lon - [-180.0 to 180.0], West longitudes are less than 0.
        year - between current year and AbstractScenario.END_YEAR
        Returns:
        the average daytime temperature at the coordinates, either estimated or exact, depending on the year

      • getTemperatureNight

        public float getTemperatureNight(float lat,
                                 float lon,
                                 int year)
        Get the average nighttime temperature at a location, given a year. If the year is the current year in the World, the temperature is the actual model temperature at that location. Otherwise it is an interpolated estimate that will NOT include the noise due to randomization in the year-stepping model.
        Specified by:
        getTemperatureNight in class AbstractClimateData
        Parameters:
        lat - [-90.0 to 90.0], South latitudes are less than 0.
        lon - [-180.0 to 180.0], West longitudes are less than 0.
        year - between current year and AbstractScenario.END_YEAR
        Returns:
        the average night temperature at the coordinates, either estimated or exact, depending on the year

      • getRainfall

        public float getRainfall(float lat,
                         float lon,
                         int year)
        Get the annual rainfall at a location, given a year. If the year is the current year in the World, the rainfall is the actual model rainfall at that location. Otherwise it is an interpolated estimate that will NOT include the noise due to randomization in the year-stepping model.
        Specified by:
        getRainfall in class AbstractClimateData
        Parameters:
        lat - [-90.0 to 90.0], South latitudes are less than 0.
        lon - [-180.0 to 180.0], West longitudes are less than 0.
        year - between current year and AbstractScenario.END_YEAR
        Returns:
        the annual rainfall at the coordinates, either estimated or exact, depending on the year

      • stepTileData

        public void stepTileData()
        Mutates all the tile data based on projections maintained within each tile and noise added randomly.

      • addNoiseByTile

        private void addNoiseByTile(LandTile tile)

      • calcTileDelta

        public float calcTileDelta(double min,
                           double max,
                           double r1,
                           double r2)
        Calculates the delta value used to add noise to tiles, given a maximum and minimum value for the parameter, and two random numbers in range [0,1] To use this for the annual rainfall delta, use 0 as the minimum.
        Parameters:
        min - minimum value in the range of the data
        max - maximum value in the range of the data
        r1 - first random number between 0 and 1
        r2 - second random number between 0 and 1
        Returns:
        the delta value used to randomize climate data

      • scaleDeltaByDistance

        public float scaleDeltaByDistance(double delta,
                                  double distance,
                                  double r3)
        Calculates the actual amount to add to a given parameter in a LandTile, given the delta value, the distance between the tile from which noise is being added and a random number in range [0,2]
        Parameters:
        delta - calculated delta value
        distance -
        r3 -
        Returns:

      • getTile

        public LandTile getTile(double lon,
                        double lat)
        Get a tile by longitude and latitude
        Parameters:
        lon - degrees longitude
        lat - degrees latitude
        Returns:
        the tile into which the specified longitude and latitude coordinates fall. If no tile exists at that point, NO_DATA is returned

      • putTile

        public void putTile(LandTile tile)
        Add a given tile to the data set. This should really only be used when reading in a new set of tiles from a file.
        Parameters:
        tile - LandTile to add

      • registerCountryTile

        public void registerCountryTile(LandTile tile)
        Registers a tile as having been associated with a country. Due to gaps in the country data, if a set of tiles covering all the land is desired, use dataTiles()
        Parameters:
        tile - tile to register

      • countryTiles

        public java.util.List<LandTile> countryTiles()
        Returns a Collection of tiles that have been registered with a country. This is dependent on the usage of registerCountryTile() at initial data creation. (Also maybe should be refactored to another location?)
        Returns:
        Collection of those LandTiles that have been registered with a Territory

      • dataTiles

        public java.util.List<LandTile> dataTiles()
        Returns a Collection of the tiles held by this TileManager that actually contain data. This, in effect, excludes tiles that would be over ocean and those at the extremes of latitude. For all tiles, use allTiles();
        Returns:
        a Collection holding only those tiles for which there exists raster data.

      • allTiles

        public java.util.List<LandTile> allTiles()
        Returns:
        all the tiles in this manager in a List

      • removeTile

        public boolean removeTile(LandTile tile)
        remove a given tile from the underlying set of tiles. This has the effect of placing a NO_DATA tile at the location of the given tile in the full projection (assuming the given tile was found)
        Parameters:
        tile - tile to remove
        Returns:
        true if the tile was found and removed

      • setWorld

        public void setWorld(World world)
        set the World for this TileManager. TileManager needs access to World-specific data for current year and randomization percentages
        Parameters:
        world - world to set for the manager

        private boolean indicesInBounds(int row,
                                int col)
